description: Angular component for game canvas, managing rendering, user input, and game loop integration with services.

classes.name: GameCanvasComponent
classes.description: Angular component implementing a game rendering canvas with user input handling and game loop logic.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook initializing canvas context, attaching canvas, resizing, and starting loop.

methods.name: resizeCanvas
methods.description: Adjusts the canvas size and schedules a second update with a slight delay.

methods.name: loop
methods.description: Main game loop updating game state, rendering, and handling game over or level completion.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Initializes game, stops current music, starts game music, and begins the game loop.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Restarts the game by invoking startGame.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key press events for arrow keys and space; forwards to game service.

methods.name: onKeyUp
methods.description: Handles key release events; forwards to game service.

methods.name: onTouchStart
methods.description: Handles touch start events; forwards to game service.

methods.name: onTouchMove
methods.description: Handles touch move events; forwards to game service.

methods.name: onTouchEnd
methods.description: Handles touch end events; forwards to game service.
